Interface ImageCache.CompressListener

  • Enclosing class:

    public static interface ImageCache.CompressListener
    set image compress scale

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCompressSize(java.lang.String imagePath)
      get image compress scale Attentions: if this function is set, the function #setCompressSize(String) is not work

    • Method Detail

      • getCompressSize

        int getCompressSize(java.lang.String imagePath)
        get image compress scale
          Attentions:
        • if this function is set, the function #setCompressSize(String) is not work
        Parameters:
        imagePath -
        Returns:
        return compressSize, If > 1, requests the decoder to subsample the original image, returning a smaller image to save memory. The sample size is the number of pixels in either dimension that correspond to a single pixel in the decoded bitmap. For example, inSampleSize == 4 returns an image that is 1/4 the width/height of the original, and 1/16 the number of pixels. Any value <= 1 is treated the same as 1. Note: the decoder will try to fulfill this request, but the resulting bitmap may have different dimensions that precisely what has been requested. Also, powers of 2 are often faster/easier for the decoder to honor.
